aka: The Yacht Isabel Arrived This Afternoon

cast.name: 阿图罗·德·科尔多瓦 Arturo de Córdova

awards:
第4届戛纳电影节(1951)
　　主竞赛单元 金棕榈奖(提名) Luis Guillermo Villegas Blanco / Carlos Hugo Christensen
　　最佳摄影 José María Beltrán

writer.name: Carlos Hugo Christensen Carlos Hugo Christensen

director.name: Carlos Hugo Christensen Carlos Hugo Christensen

this_title: La Balandra Isabel llegó esta tarde
trans_title: 伊莎贝尔的帆船午后到达
The Yacht Isabel Arrived This Afternoon
introduction: A Captain with a mistress at another port leaves his wife on a routine trip with his son. There, after making a hasty retreat from his mistress, she, with the help of a local shaman, conspire to take him away from his family forever.
chinese_title: 伊莎贝尔的帆船午后到达
foreign_title: La Balandra Isabel llegó esta tarde
